new_videos.title: Shen Zai Jiong Tu
new_videos.description: Девятикратной Небесной Владыка неожиданно попадает в мир смертных и теряет всю свою божественную силу. Превратившись из бессмертного в смертного и начав заново свой путь самосовершенствования, под влиянием кухонной служанки он вступает на путь самосовершенствования, где можно повышать свой уровень с помощью еды. Ища различные деликатесы по всей стране, он постепенно восстанавливает свою силу.

new_videos.title: Ling Tian Du Zun
new_videos.description: Легендарный святой мечник Лин Тянь бросил вызов небесам, чтобы спасти возлюбленную. Правда, Небесное дао поймало его в ловушку, и герой отдал жизнь, чтобы нанести ему удар. Однако не смерть ждала Лин Тяня, а перерождение в прошлом за 300 лет до роковых событий. В те времена он являлся неудачником с поврежденным даньтянем, зато возлюбленная была еще жива, а враги не принимали его всерьез. Со знаниями и опытом прежней жизни Лин Тянь готов исправить былые ошибки и изменить предначертанную судьбу.

new_videos.title: Kirei ni Shitemoraemasu ka.
new_videos.description: Эта приморская история о жизни с очаровательной главной героиней предлагает спокойствие среди хаоса современного мира. Вот уже два года Вакана Киммэ работает прачкой в приморском курортном городке Атами, где она построила полноценную жизнь, подружившись с местными жителями и посетив горячие источники. Хотя Вакана ничего не знает о своем прошлом, её услуги по уборке хранят воспоминания, вложенные в ценные вещи клиентов.

new_videos.title: Soul Land 2: The Peerless Tang Clan
new_videos.description:
Странный континент в другом мире.

 Никакой магии, никакой боевой ци, никаких боевых искусств, только боевые духи. Через десять тысяч лет после того, как клан Тан был основан на континенте Доуло, клан Тан оказался на грани исчезновения.

Родилось целое новое поколение гордых талантов. Сможет ли новое поколение семи монстров Шрека восстановить клан Тан и сочинить новую историю о величии непревзойдённого клана Тан?

new_videos.title: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals 2nd Season
Majutsushi Kunon wa Mieteiru
new_videos.description: Рождённый слепым, Кунон ставит перед собой цель — стать первым человеком, который с помощью магии воды создаст себе новые глаза. Всего за пять месяцев упорного изучения он уже превзошёл своего учителя и продолжает развивать свои способности. Его магия позволяет ему не только различать цвета, но и создавать полезные предметы и даже вызвать целую кошку! Слухи о его талантах и изобретательности вскоре доходят до королевского двора, и Кунон получает место ученика у самого могущественного мага королевства. Но осуществима ли его высшая мечта?

new_videos.title: Majutsushi Kunon wa Mieteiru
new_videos.description: Рождённый слепым, Кунон ставит перед собой цель — стать первым человеком, который с помощью магии воды создаст себе новые глаза. Всего за пять месяцев упорного изучения он уже превзошёл своего учителя и продолжает развивать свои способности. Слухи о его талантах и изобретательности вскоре доходят до королевского двора, и Кунон получает место ученика у самого могущественного мага королевства. Но осуществима ли его высшая мечта?

new_videos.title: Ikoku Nikki
new_videos.description: Замкнутая писательница Кодай Макио всегда предпочитала общество книг, но когда её сестра и зять умирают, Макио неожиданно становится опекуном своей 15-летней племянницы Такуми Асы. Преодолевая горе, конфликты и трудности совместной жизни, они постепенно открывают друг другу свои сердца, обретая тепло, понимание и смысл семьи.

new_videos.title: Ikoku Nikki
new_videos.description: Замкнутая писательница Кодай Макио всегда предпочитала общество книг, но когда её сестра и зять умирают, Макио неожиданно становится опекуном своей 15-летней племянницы Такуми Асы. new_videos.title: Sentenced to Be a Hero: The Prison Records of Penal Hero Unit 9004
new_videos.description: Героизм — наказание для самых отъявленных преступников. Осужденные на участь героя вынуждены сражаться на передовой против армии короля демонов — и даже если они погибают, их оживляют, чтобы вновь отправить в бой. Но когда их предводитель, осужденный за убийство богини, встречает другую богиню, заключенный между ними договор может оказаться достаточно сильным, чтобы изменить мир...

new_videos.title: The Gate of Mystical Realm
new_videos.description: Сирота Ши Му, выросший в глухой деревне, обнаруживает, что его прошлое окутано тайной предательства. Получив таинственное наследие от пропавшего отца и дар морской девы, он отправляется в город Фэн. Там, в борьбе кланов и на смертельных турнирах, ему предстоит пробудить свою уникальную силу, узнать правду о происхождении и отомстить, бросив вызов самому миропорядку.

new_videos.title: The God of War Dominates
new_videos.description: Знаменитого мастера боевых искусств Цинь Ченя предали те, кого он считал друзьями, и в результате он погиб в каньоне Смерти. И возродился в Империи Небесная Юань в 2516 году согласно огненному календарю. В новой жизнь мать Цинь Ченя - красавица, которой надлежало стать императорской наложницей, но, покинув дом, она отправилась в странствие, из которого вернулась с ребенком на руках. Чтобы избежать позора, ее отец настоял на необходимости породниться с династией Цинь. Так маленький Чень с матерью оказался во враждебно к ним настроенном дворце.

new_videos.title: Against The Sky Supreme
new_videos.description:
Действие аниме происходит во вселенной, которая разделена на два мира: внутренний и внешний. И, как водится, два эти мира находятся в состоянии непримиримой войны. Внешний мир находится под управлением демонов, а внутренний мир, принадлежащий людям, в свою очередь состоит из трёх реальностей, или царств, — царства небожителей, царства бессмертных и царства смертных. Кроме того, в этой вселенной есть множество измерений смертных, где правят девять императоров, которые тоже не могут мирно сосуществовать.
Главный герой оказывается вовлечен в борьбу и интриги, которые пронизывают все миры.

new_videos.title: Against The Sky Supreme
new_videos.description:

new_videos.title: Heaven Scrap Master
Goumon Baito-kun no Nichijou
new_videos.description: Это мир, где убийства и пытки легализованы, а также существуют многочисленные "компании, работающие по контракту на пытки". Сэро и Сиу работают неполный рабочий день в пыточной компании, которая известна хорошим отношением к своим сотрудникам и нацелена только на плохих людей. Двое новых сотрудников на неполный рабочий день — Микэ и Хью — также присоединились к компании, и все четверо наслаждаются своей нелегкой трудовой жизнью.

new_videos.title: Mofa Gongzhu de Xiao Fannao
new_videos.description: Прекрасная Атанасия была убита руками своего собственного биологического отца, Клода де Эльджео Обелия, хладнокровного императора! Можно подумать что это лишь очередная детская страшилка на ночь… пока одна женщина не просыпается и внезапно не обнаруживает, что стала той несчастной принцессой! Ей нужен план, чтобы пережить свою обреченную судьбу, ведь время на исходе. Согласится ли она с планом А, жить как можно тише, не привлекая внимания печально известного императора? План Б: собрать достаточно денег, чтобы сбежать из дворца? Или ей придется придерживаться плана С, добиваясь расположения отца сладкими речами?!

new_videos.title: Mofa Gongzhu de Xiao Fannao
new_videos.description: Прекрасная Атанасия была убита руками своего собственного биологического отца, Клода де Эльджео Обелия, хладнокровного императора! new_videos.title: Osananajimi to wa Love Comedy ni Naranai
new_videos.description: У старшеклассника Сакаи Ёносукэ две крупных проблемы в жизни: одну зовут Минамо Сио, а вторую — Хиодоси Акари, это две девушки, которые являются не только его одноклассницами, но и подругами детства. Казалось бы, живи — и радуйся! Ведь подруга детства — непременная составляющая каждого гарема и каждой любовной комедии, а у него их целых две! Однако сделать заветный шаг от друзей к романтической паре — оказалось для каждого из них слишком сложно, так как каждый застрял во взятой на себя роли. Акари отыгрывает роль назойливой цундере, Сио изображает неловкую глупышку, а Ёносукэ изо всех сил старается делать вид, что присутствие двух оформившихся красоток его нисколечко не волнует. Смогут ли они добиться желаемого, продолжая скрываться за маской, или им всё же придётся стать честными?

schedule.description:
When high schooler Mari bumps into a fellow tardy student, she's surprised to find out he's a beastfolk who's to attend her school! After all, it's not rare for beastfolk to coexist alongside humans, but it's still uncommon, with the prejudice and all. Nervous to meet one at first, Mari soon learns there's more to him than his furry exterior. In fact, the more she gets to know him, the more she finds herself drawn to him, his steadfastness, his kindheartedness, and... his body...

(Source: Yen Press)
schedule.title: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru

schedule.description:
I met my childhood friend again, and she had become a beautiful and innocent girl.

"It's been a while, Hayato."
"Haruki, is it?"

In the past, I used to play in the mud with my childhood friend in the countryside, and when I saw him again, there was no trace of the bratty young man I thought he was back then. Only in front of Hayato, she threw away the coat she was wearing and reacted in the same crass way she did back then. The distance between you and me has not changed.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)

schedule.title: Girls & Panzer: Saishuushou Part 5

schedule.description: Sequel to Dorohedoro.
schedule.title: Dorohedoro (Zoku-hen)

schedule.description:
Yuusuke is an office worker with a dislike for people, preferring to do his job alone and in silence. When the company he works for suddenly goes bankrupt, he loses his job, and with that, all his motivation disappears, and he becomes a complete shut-in. On one of the rare days he decides to leave his apartment after a week-long video game binge, a mysterious man attacks him and bites his arm. Though Yuusuke manages to escape back to his room, he comes down with a fever and becomes bedridden for several days.

When Yuusuke wakes up, recovered, he goes to resume his normal life, but he soon finds that in the short time he was asleep the world has completely changed. Zombies have emerged in every corner of the world simultaneously, and the few human survivors are now in hiding. However... "Why am I the only one the zombies don't attack?"

How will Yuusuke take advantage of his new situation, and what will he discover?

(Source: VNDB)
schedule.title: Zombie no Afureta Sekai de Ore dake ga Osowarenai

schedule.description: Second season of Sasaki to Pii-chan.
schedule.title: Sasaki and Peeps Season 2

schedule.description:
Growing complacent with his title of "World's Strongest Boy," Baki Hanma spends his days in a haze of boredom. After finally settling the feud with his demonic father Yuujirou, Baki defends his title in the Kourakuen Underground Arena while stifling yawns brought about by the ease with which he defeats his challengers. Baki's friends and mentors also struggle with this new peaceful stasis, completing great feats of strength training with little enthusiasm.

Soon, Japan is shaken by the reveal of a long-gestating science experiment that results in the successful cloning of legendary samurai Musashi Miyamoto. The famed warrior relishes in testing his strength against Baki and the other fighting icons of Tokyo, but he struggles to assimilate with the modern era. Miyamoto clings to his ancient ideals of honor and dueling to the death, a philosophy that clashes with the more tranquil present.

As the resurrected swordsman attempts to rise to the top of this unfamiliar society by cutting through Baki's friends, he finds himself on a collision course with the vengeful teenager. Baki embraces this rush of excitement and meets his new rival head-on.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
schedule.title: Baki-dou

schedule.description: Sequel to Tokyo Revengers: Tenjiku-hen.
schedule.title: Tokyo Revengers (Zoku-hen)

schedule.description: Third season of Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu.
schedule.title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 3

schedule.description:
Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess,... anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"... 

(Source: MU)
schedule.title: Petals of Reincarnation

schedule.description:
This is a story of conspiracy and redemption set on the magnificent and fantastical Island of Siliang. It begins with the protagonist, Jingxuan, investigating the truth behind his parents' deaths, gradually uncovering the secrets of the island's past while showcasing the journey of a group of young people striving to grow and break free from their shackles in pursuit of their life goals.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated and edited)
schedule.title: The Island of Siliang 3rd Season

schedule.description:
"You useless son of mine! You were supposed to pull master swordsman, but I never thought it would be this tragic!"

The day a child turns fifteen, they undergo the Ritual of Divine Blessing. Already descended from a line of master swordsman, Elymas was supposed to succeed his father. However, he pulls the defective class, the Heavy Knight, and not only loses his status as future head of the household, but he's also exiled. With their unbalanced stats and seemingly useless skills, Heavy Knights are spoked of as a class for cowards and the lazy. However, Elymas knows the truth. The world he lives in is the same as the one of the game he used to play... It is the Heavy Knight that is the most powerful class of them all. Using memories from his past life, Elymas has set out to effectively conquer this entire world.

(Source: Kodansha USA)
schedule.title: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System

schedule.description: Second season of Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san.
schedule.title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian Season 2

schedule.description:
DECASIM, a virtual world created from a perfect copy of reality. More than just a simulation, it's a complete copy of a real city, a forbidden place where memories of every past crime lie dormant. "Clues" found in DECASIM can help unravel the riddles of the real world.

(Source: Official site)
schedule.title: Decapolice

schedule.description:
In 2026, Japan continues its isolation under the Edo Shogunate. Amidst strict social hierarchies, three individuals, treated as scums of society, cross paths in a prison cell destined for a fateful encounter. They join the dueling video platform "KILLTUBE" to pursue fortune and to win their freedom in a segregational world.

In an era dubbed the "Age of Great Duels," where one can amass immense wealth simply by defeating the strong, they face discrimination from samurais and merchants seeking power and authority. As they break the limits of convention and claim victory after victory, they rise in popularity, becoming decorated celebrities of their time.
However, just as they reach the height of their fame, they uncover the hidden truth behind "KILLTUBE"...

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)
schedule.title: KillTube

schedule.description:
Rising from the ashes, a fallen noblewoman stands to save humanity!

After the Demon King's defeat, Countess Romelia's world is shattered when Prince Henri, her fiancé, publicly breaks off their engagement, dismissing her as "useless" alongside his new allies: Saint Elizabeth, the sage Ekaterina, and the swordswoman Lu Hime. What they don't realize is that Romelia possesses a secret power called "Grace," which brings her extraordinary luck. Left abandoned and humiliated, Romelia refuses to give up. With her homeland still under siege by the remnants of the demon army and her people enslaved, she embarks on a desperate mission to save them.

Facing overwhelming challenges—no army, no healers, no funds, and only inexperienced recruits—Romelia uses her wit and determination to turn the odds in her favor. She seizes fortresses from local lords to build her forces, negotiates with the church for healing, secures funds from merchants, and has her soldiers gain experience through monster hunting. Against all expectations, Romelia rises from the ashes, leading her loyal followers in a daring campaign to rescue her people and prove her worth.

(Source: MAL News)
schedule.title: A History of the Romelia

schedule.description:
Okuto Nakamura is a timid and gloomy-looking student who cherishes only two things in this world: his pet octopus and his kind-hearted classmate, Aiki Hirose. Ever since the school entrance ceremony, Nakamura has admired his jovial classmate, albeit from a distance due to his poor social skills. After mustering up all the courage within him, he finally decides to talk to Hirose.

During this first attempt to make contact, an instinctive mistake turns the idea of friendship into a distant dream, as he creates a hilarious impression on his crush. At school, students are expected to cooperate on numerous activities together, meaning Nakamura gets to spend extra time with Hirose. Given these opportunities, can he successfully redeem himself and accomplish his goal of becoming good friends with Hirose?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
schedule.title: Ganbare! Nakamura-kun!!

schedule.description:
The deadly game is back!

Once again, sixteen Magical Girls have been assembled for a high-stakes challenge. Every three days, their Magical Phone pulls them into an RPG-like simulation where they have to work together to fight enemies, solve puzzles, and earn Magical Candy to advance. A staggering ten billion yen reward awaits them at the end—but only for the players who land the finishing blow. With such a tantalizing prize on the line, it's only a matter of time before the girls turn on each other—and if their hit points drop to zero, a game over will be the least of their worries... 

(Source: Mahou Shoujo Ikusei Keikaku Wiki, edited)
schedule.title: Mahou Shoujo Ikusei Keikaku: Restart

schedule.description:
When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she unexpectedly ran into the rumored "First-Class Handsome Guy" at a bar. However, she soon discovered that he was Sang Yan, someone she had hurt and rejected in high school. In a twist of fate, these two individuals who could never get along found themselves constantly crossing paths. They even ended up renting the same unit by chance and becoming housemates. With unspoken feelings buried deep within, strong emotions begin to stir...

Let's see how Sang Yan, the "Peak Ideal Boyfriend," interprets and expresses his profound affection and sweet love!

(Source: INKR)
schedule.title: Nan Hong

schedule.description:
In order to go back to the past, Guan Chao tries hard to find the "burning stone" that activates the time gun, but accidentally falls into the Memory Management Bureau. Only by conquering the BUG people in the memory layer can he return to reality. With the help of administrators such as Fangtang and Baizhong, can Guan Chao successfully complete the task? What kind of challenges are awaiting Guan Chao in each memory layer...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
schedule.title: False Memory

schedule.description:
The animated short film collection "Chinese Tales 2" is jointly produced by Shanghai Animation Film Studio, Shanghai Film Studio, Bilibili, and Chen Liaoyu Studio. Chen Liaoyu is the chief director. The work brings together 12 directors to create 9 short films with different styles. The second part of the story will enter the world of fireworks. On the basis of continuing "telling Chinese stories in a Chinese way", it will focus more on the thinking and discussion of people's self-identity, family relationships, and social relationships, while continuing to show the fantasy imagination in the local context.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
schedule.title: Yao-Chinese Folktales 2

schedule.description:
The protagonist Ning Que travels to a seemingly real Tang Dynasty world, only to find that it is a dangerous world of cultivation. He originally thought that he could live a life of luxury and become superior, but he finds that he had no talent for cultivation. Additionally, he witnessed the massacre of his entire family at the age of four and was hunted for thousands of miles. While escaping death, he picked up a black umbrella in a sea of ​​blood and corpses and found the infant Sangsang. In despair, he found the motivation to live. Unwilling to bow to fate, he takes the big black umbrella and Sangsang, and begins a thrilling counterattack.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
schedule.title: Jiang Ye

schedule.description:
On days when Sunao is sick, or not feeling like going to school, she is called to take her place. She was born to this world when Sunao wished to have a substitute. No one knows that she exists, but she tries to do her best for Sunao whenever she is called. One day she talks with Sanada, one of her classmates. They become friends, but soon he notices that she is different from the original Sunao...he was the first one who did. She tells him to talk with her only when she has her hair half-up. Sanada does like she told him, and they enjoy their time together. As they become closer, she realizes that she has special feelings toward Sanada. But she doesn't know what will happen to her...if she, a replica, falls in love.

(Source: Kadokawa)
schedule.title: Replica datte, Koi wo Suru.

schedule.description:
Kore Kaite Shine is set in Izu Oshima, an island 120 kilometers south of Tokyo. The story centers on Ai Yasumi, a high school girl who loves to read manga, and learns about the joy and pain of drawing her own manga

(Source: ANN)
schedule.title: Kore Kaite Shine

schedule.description:
Following the emotional journey of a six-year-old girl named Daisy, who loses her mother in a tragic accident and struggles to adapt to life with her aunt. One sleepless night, she encounters a mysterious girl named Dahlia at her window. Their days together begin to transcend time and space, bringing a cosmic perspective to Daisy’s modest life in a downtown yakisoba restaurant.

(Source: Variety)
schedule.title: Daisy's Life

schedule.description: Second season of Ao Ashi.
schedule.title: Ao Ashi 2nd Season

schedule.description:
In a fictional world where humans, demons and monsters coexist, Chen Changsheng comes to the capital of gods with a marriage certificate in order to change his fate. Together with a group of young heroes, he waged a desperate battle against the forces of darkness. At the same time, he also harvested love and started his journey of rising as a powerful man in the capital of gods.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
schedule.title: Ze Tian Ji (2026)

schedule.description:
Luolan Mansion, one of the five major mansions of Daxia in Shenzhou Continent, has fallen into decline due to the mysterious disappearance of two mansion masters. Although the young mansion master Li Luo is extremely talented and was born with three phase palaces, he has difficulty practicing because of his natural empty phase. 

Jiang Qinge, with whom he had been engaged since childhood, has a ninth-grade light phase and is extremely talented. Realizing the gap between them, Li Luo wanted to cancel the contract and break off the engagement, but was rejected by Jiang Qinge. 

On his seventeenth birthday, Li Luo took away the secret treasure left by his parents and obtained the water light phase, but the price was that his hair turned white overnight and his life was overdrawn. If he wanted to extend his life, he had to reach the state of a marquis within five years.

(Source: iQIYI, Google translated)
schedule.title: Absolute Resonance

schedule.description:
For a natural genius like Crown Prince Cecil Glow Alfostar, every day is a bore. Knowledge and skills come far too easily for him, to the point that nothing can captivate his interest. However, this changes the day he meets someone who never fails to betray his expectations—his fiancée and self-proclaimed villainess Bertia Evil Nochesse.

Bertia claims that this world is that of an "otome game." She has been reborn as the villainess, and it is her duty to impede the relationship between Cecil and the heroine. Never one to shy away from fate, she zealously takes to her evil role... to mixed results. Though she doesn't realize it, Bertia's supposedly "evil deeds" always come off as sincere and kind. Finally relieved of his melancholy, there is never a boring day for Cecil as he observes his unknowingly good-hearted fiancée.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
schedule.title: Jishou Akuyaku Reijou na Konyakusha no Kansatsu Kiroku.

schedule.description:
"You're the bride I've been searching for all this time."

A Japanese-style ayakashi Cinderella story! The ayakashi and humans coexist in harmony. The ayakashi, having superior abilities and beautiful appearances, sometimes find their partner among human women, making them their "bride." The bride, in exchange for bringing prosperity, receives absolute love from the ayakashi.

Yuzu is constantly compared to her sister, a bride of a demon fox, and is resented by her family every day. One day, when Yuzu just couldn't take things anymore, a man appeared before her on a bridge. This man is the most beautiful man Yuzu has ever seen... and he's calling her his wife?!

"Just be quiet and let me hold you." The most powerful, "cold-hearted" ayakashi is pouring his heart out for Yuzu?!

(Souce: MangaPlaza, edited)
schedule.title: Oni no Hanayome

schedule.description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place—one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a...um...decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo's super powers and Kayden's uber-smarts, they're out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)
schedule.title: Eleceed

schedule.description:
High schooler Shiori Maezawa suddenly breaks her smartphone and finds herself in a deserted, alternate version of Yokohama. When she checks the device, she discovers photos of herself posted on social media, despite having no memory of taking them. Realizing that another version of herself is behind it and may be spiraling out of control, Shiori must navigate the strange labyrinth within her phone to stop her other self and find a way back.

(Source: Official site, translated)
schedule.title: Meikyuu no Shiori

schedule.description: Second season of Black Clover.
schedule.title: Black Clover Season 2

schedule.description:
The sole thing that gets the middle-aged Sasaki through his soul-sucking job is a cheerful smile from Yamada—the young woman who works at a nearby 24-hour supermarket he frequents. After every tiring day of getting berated by his boss, Sasaki stops by the store to have his spirit healed by his favorite cashier.

After a particularly grueling day, Sasaki shows up at the supermarket, only to find that Yamada's shift has already ended. Disappointed, he searches for a place to smoke when a woman from behind the store calls him over to join her. The bold and dangerously playful Tayama is quick to call out Sasaki's peculiar habit of always seeking out her coworker—even going as far as telling Yamada about Sasaki's vested interest in her.

Now, in addition to seeing his adored cashier Yamada, Sasaki also visits the store to see if his new smoking partner Tayama is around. But there is more to Tayama's mischievousness than she initially lets on. With every cigarette, an unlikely friendship begins to blossom.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
schedule.title: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

schedule.description:
Miya is the illegitimate child of a certain prominent family. When her mother dies, she's convinced she knows what awaits her in her new home: a life of servitude and misery at the hands of her wicked stepmother and stepsisters! Yet when she finally meets the women she expects to treat her like dirt, they actually end up being...sweet?!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
schedule.title: My Mother-in-Law and Sister-in-Law Who Don't Bully Me.

schedule.description: Second season of Isekai Nonbiri Nouka.
schedule.title: Farming Life in Another World Season 2

schedule.description: Sequel to Made in Abyss: Retsujitsu no Ougonkyou.
schedule.title: Made in Abyss: The Golden City of the Scorching Sun (Sequel)

schedule.description: Second season of Biao Ren: Blades of the Guardians.
schedule.title: Blades of the Guardians 2nd Season

schedule.description:
In this world, the concept of levels exist. Other than those who live off defeating monsters, most people are only around level 1 to 5. What's more, not just anyone can go out to hunt monsters; it's heavily influenced by one's role anointed by God. There are eight such eligible roles. Warrior. Fighter. Cleric. Magician. Rogue. Merchant. Hunter. Sorcerer. Those blessed with extraordinary power are divided into three types. Royalty. Heroes. Sages. But for the majority of the population, they have no such powers and live by farming or running shops. Towns are developed by those with the weakest role...villagers.

For the powerless villagers going out to hunt monsters is equivalent to committing suicide. But one day, a certain two-year-old child given the role of villager notices something.

Once you defeat a monster... you can earn great wealth.
schedule.title: The Villager of Level 999

schedule.description:
The time is Sengoku.

Japan is fractured into many independent nations entangled in ceaseless war. At the center lies Ashina, a land of sacred earth and ancient mystery. Two decades after Sword Saint Isshin Ashina reclaimed the region in a brutal coup, a new threat emerges from within: The Interior Ministry. Desperate to protect his homeland, Isshin's grandson Gen'ichirou turns to forbidden powers. The only hope lies in a kidnapped boy — the Divine Heir — and his silent protector: a loyal shinobi known only as Sekiro.

This is the story of a lord and his retainer — and their quest to restore balance to a nation on the edge.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
schedule.title: Sekiro: No Defeat

schedule.description: The third season of Da Li Si Rizhi.
schedule.title: White Cat Legend Season 3

schedule.description: Side story about the Tarot Club's first mission. Qilangos, one of the Seven Pirate Admirals, has arrived in Backlund. Alger strikes a deal with  Audrey to get her to use her connections to find more information on Qilangos' whereabouts, and hopes that the Fool can help kill him the Pirate Admiral.
schedule.title: Lord of Mysteries Special: Prey

schedule.description: New BanG Dream! series featuring a virtual all-girl band, Mugendai Mewtype.
schedule.title: BanG Dream! Yume∞Mita

schedule.description: Second part of Kanojo, Okarishimasu 4th Season.
schedule.title: Kanojo, Okarishimasu 4th Season Part 2

schedule.description:
In 199x, the world was engulfed in the blaze of nuclear war.

With the Ocean drying up and Earth torn asunder, all life seems to be lost but humans survived stubbornly. However, what dominated the post-apocalyptic world was sheer violence. The remaining humanity was split into two groups: those who kill and take whatever they can and those who are exploited.

When all hope seems lost for the weak, a man in ragged cloth appears. He is Kenshiro, the rightful successor of the Hokuto Shinken martial arts with seven studs-like scars in the shape of the Big Dipper. His journey to becoming a legendary savior begins! 

(Source: Warner Bros. Japan, edited)
schedule.title: Hokuto no Ken: Fist of the North Star

schedule.description:
Set in a world where 90% of humanity has contracted and died from a deadly, virulent disease, only to rise again as attacking zombies, thirteen years have passed since the "Red Day" of societal collapse. The surviving humans now live away from the big cities, still hoping to reclaim them one day. An entirely new generation, unaware of the pre-Red Day world, is coming into its own.

The story begins when Aki, who has no memories of the world before its fall, escapes her village with her close friends Haru and Natsuki to search for her missing father. As they venture into the outside world, they find themselves surrounded by zombies on all sides! Along the way, they rescue Yuu and Sakura and take refuge in a home improvement store. They regroup, and now the counterattack begins—!!

(Source: Kadokawa, edited)
schedule.title: #Zombie Sagashitemasu

schedule.description:
When a former demon king and a former hero are reincarnated in a peaceful world, they accidentally begin to fall in love!

Narukami Ryusei is a NEET by profession. He spends his days hiding and playing video games, but he was actually a demon king in a world other than this one. Here, the hero who once defeated Ryuusei and is now a high school girl, Hanaori Mitya, arrives to visit him.

This is a romantic comedy about a former hero and a former demon king.

(Source: Kodansha, edited)
schedule.title: Hanaori-san Wants to Have a Fight Even If She Reincarnates

schedule.description: A new original anime inspired by The Little Mermaid follows the story of a mermaid who wishes to be loved by a human but tragically dies. She is reincarnated 200 years later in Lake Biwa in modern-day Japan. As she navigates her new life, she learns how to fit into the human world.
schedule.title: Goodbye, Lara

schedule.description: Sequel to Seishun Buta Yarou wa Santa Claus no Yume wo Minai.
schedule.title: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Dear Friend no Yume wo Minai

schedule.description: Anime adaptation of the game Gensou Suikoden II.
schedule.title: Gensou Suikoden

schedule.description:
Misaki, a university student, feeling the weight of everyday life and uncertain about her future, she longs for adventure and something she can be truly passionate about.

At the start of the new day on campus, members of the Travel Train Club (commonly known as the Tetsuryo Club) invite Misaki to join them, as she steps into the world of railways, Misaki's heart beats with excitement for the journey that awaits her.

(Source: MAL News)
schedule.title: Tetsuryou! Meet with Tetsudou Musume

schedule.description: The third season of Cang Yuan Tu.
schedule.title: The Demon Hunter 3rd Season

schedule.description:
People become ‘ghouls’ upon dying, and will enter the physical world through a door to cause chaos. Zhang Zha, a mere delivery boy, accidentally entered a haunted house, and resulted in a crisis— a ‘ghoul’ breakout. As such, people from all factions began to make an appearance in the story, while Zhang Zha continues to grow upon experiencing a series of adventures and fights with a mysterious scroll about modern Jianghu slowly unfolding alongside.

(Source: MU)
schedule.title: Chu Wu

schedule.description:
The story of Let's Go Kaiki-gumi follows a nameless protagonist who is six times more vulnerable to spiritual phenomena than the average human being. One day, the protagonist encounters Mechako, a mysterious girl who runs the Kaiki-gumi, an organization that polices the behavior of the ghosts and monsters that threaten human beings, and he somehow gets roped into helping the Kaiki-gumi re-establish itself, resulting in all sorts of strange events and spooky shenanigans.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
schedule.title: Let's Go Kaiki-gumi

schedule.description:
Fate had never been kind to Ji Ning. Wracked by illnesses and infirm his entire life on Earth, Ning knew early on that he would die as a teenager. What he didn’t know was that there really was such a thing as life after death, and that the universe was a far larger place than he thought. A lucky twist of fate (one of the few in Ning’s life) meant that Ning was reborn into a world of Immortals and monsters, of Ki Refiners and powerful Fiendgods, a world where Dynasties lasted for millions of years. A world which is both greater and yet also smaller than he ever could imagine. He would have the opportunity to join them, and in this life, Ning swore to himself, he would never let himself be weak again! The Era he was born into was a Desolate one, but Ning would make it his era.

(Source: Novel Update)
schedule.title: The Desolate Era

schedule.description:
In Chinjuku, the city that never sleeps, there is a psychic senior police officer who has powers beyond human comprehension! His name is Meguru Choujou! Along with his judo expert partner Nao Ippongi, this hilarious duo will keep the streets clean by any means necessary!

(Source: MANGA Plus)
schedule.title: Choujun! Choujou-senpai

schedule.description:
The strange way of heaven, the unusual immortals and Buddhas, are they true or false? Li Huowang, who was in confusion, could not tell.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Huo Wang

schedule.description:
Determined to avenge his parents, the young human Wang Dong becomes an armed warrior, joining the Storm Squad and vowing to annihilate the entire Zag Zerg horde in the solar system. Through arduous struggles, Wang Dong awakens his Blade Warrior abilities, continuously upgrading his armor skills. Ultimately, Wang Dong and his companions uncover the ultimate Zag Zerg conspiracy lurking on Earth. The protagonists, one after another, face the overwhelming Zerg swarm. Wang Dong awakens his ultimate Blade Warrior abilities, unleashing his eighth brain region to slay both the human traitor and the Zerg leader, Ying Yuan.

(Source: Youku, Google translated)
schedule.title: Galactic Storm Warriors

schedule.description:
In order to resist the foreign evil organization that intends to destroy the Great Zhou Kingdom, the genius wizard Zuo Xiao gathered four sacred artifacts, practiced the five elements magic, protected the dragon veins of the Great Zhou Kingdom, and defeated the foreign evil forces one by one.

(Source: Youku, Google translated)
schedule.title: Aggressor Killer

schedule.description:
In 2145, a century after the nuclear apocalypse triggered by the "New Human Project," which aimed to fully unleash humanity's potential, the surviving humans established a new social order on the wasteland. In this new world built upon technology, superpowers, and magic, Jiang Li, the only "complete New Human," awakens from hibernation and begins his legendary story.

(Source: Youku, translated)
schedule.title: Wasteland Knight

schedule.description:
Orphan Qin Yu is specially recruited into the most powerful academy, the Dongda High Martial Arts Academy. However, behind the peaceful city, the demonic threat quietly approaches. Young Qin Yu vows to lead the faculty and students of the academy to fight against the demon invasion.

(Source: Youku, Google translated)
schedule.title: Oriental Martial Academy

schedule.description:
Prince Ning Ming was chosen by a demon star and became the source of corruption in the world. To discover his origins and cleanse the corruption, he joined a secret agency. On his quest for the truth, the powerful Lord of the Ming granted Ning Ming extraordinary abilities, the supreme Emperor of the Zhou protected him, the daring Nightingale sisters favored him, and various prodigies willingly risked everything to help him cleanse the world of corruption. As he neared the truth, Ning Ming witnessed the world's cruelty and vowed to eliminate all corruption and save humanity.

(Source: Youku)
schedule.title: Lord of the Eternal Night

schedule.description:
For the greater good of mankind, Bai Xiaochun is forced to engage in a decisive battle with Tongtian Daoist. With the old world shattered, everyone drifts to the Eternal Continent beyond the heavens. Here, Bai Xiaochun faces even more severe challenges and more powerful enemies...

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: A Will Eternal 4th Season

schedule.description:
The Pure Sea's currents flow from north to south, constantly flowing through this world. People build homes and thrive on the backs of giant beasts. Every wish has its response. The deity known as Fan Ying warns that only by letting your wishes run wild can you reap the rewards of miracles and survive. However, the unchanging rules are about to change, and those who transcend fate will eventually follow the origin of all things.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Bringer

schedule.description:
The vast sea turns to dust, the thunder and lightning cease, and the mist approaches the earth once again. The shackles of the world are once again unlocked, and a brand new world unveils a mysterious corner...

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Sheng Xu

schedule.description: The seventh season of Wu Dong Qian Kun.
schedule.title: Martial Universe 7th Season

schedule.description: The seventh season of Xingchen Bian.
schedule.title: Stellar Transformation 7th Season

schedule.description: The seventh season of Quanzhi Fashi.
schedule.title: Full-Time Magister 7th Season

schedule.description:
Mo Fan, Lingling, Zhao Manyan, and others come to Beiyuan to investigate the mysterious destruction of Beiyuan Village. During their investigation, they discover that it was the work of Leng Jue of the Black Church, who was parasitized by the Red Beast, who colluded with the evil forces of Nile. They also discover that there is an even bigger conspiracy behind them. When faced with the Red Beast's trap again, what actions will Mo Fan and his companions take?

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: The Almighty Mage SP: Beiyuan Crisis

schedule.description:
Traversing countless worlds, reborn through endless quests, a blood-stained pact forged a night of beheadings. A merciless blade swept across the seven paradises, scattering countless heads and transforming the hunter Su Xiao into a terrifying symbol. Yet, even as killing became a daily routine, life and death a minor matter, he could not forget the death of his parents. The sinister smile of the gray gentleman beneath his hat, the eerie totems rising from corpses, and the oppressive might of the ancient god in the darkness gradually revealed the truth of that year. Chasing the true culprit, carrying on the legacy of the extermination of the law, and restoring balance to the elements became his inevitable destiny.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Reincarnation Paradise

schedule.description:
Zhou Ming travels through time and space and became Duncan, Captain of the Lost Homeland, a terrifying evil god known as the Moving Scourge. In this deep-sea world created by an ancient god, the old order has been shattered, and isolated island cities are the only remaining lights of civilization. Yet, the shadows of the past lurk within the depths. So, Captain Duncan leads a diverse crew, delving into the perilous depths, and gradually begins to uncover history, glimpsing a glimpse of a despairing truth.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Abyssal Embers

schedule.description:
The story focuses on the final battle of the Immortal Ancient Era. The ancestral spirit, the Willow God, steps forward to lead the people in their search for hope. The Desolate Emperor, Shi Hao, uses a drop of his true blood to create a clone, reversing time and space to descend into the Immortal Ancient Era. In a shared struggle of life and death, he seeks the ultimate remedy to eradicate darkness. A great catastrophe of darkness descends, marking the tragic final chapter of the Immortal Ancient Era!

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Wanmei Shijie Movie: Jiu Jie Fen Tian

schedule.description:
During Luo Feng's training on the Primordial Star, he is faced with the covetousness and encirclement of the alien races. He uses his wisdom and strength to turn the tables and uphold the dignity of humanity. "I have a blade that can cleave the universe!" That breathtakingly beautiful battle blade accompanies Luo Feng as he slashes his way through the world! The Demon Race, the Mechanical Race, and the Insect Race reappear, forming a three-race alliance. The leaders of the three races, along with 6,000 Universe Venerables, besiege Luo Feng. Luo Feng unleashes the powerful force of "I Am the Universe" to annihilate them in one fell swoop.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Tunshi Xingkong Movie: Juezhan Yuanshi Xing

schedule.description:
After the release of the divine artifact Shiva's Wrath, Cangnan City faces an unprecedented crisis. With the Western evil gods lurking in their wake, are the Chinese gods about to awaken? Infused with the power of the twin gods, Lin Qiye joins the Night Watchmen of Cangnan City in fighting against the Western evil gods and defending Cangnan! The Second War of the Gods is about to begin!

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Zhan Shen Movie: Cang Nan Zhi Shang

schedule.description:
The story features a distinct worldview, diverse genres, and bizarre and treacherous spirit realms. The protagonist, Zhang Yuanqing, becomes a night-wandering deity thanks to a mysterious black card, only to find himself caught in a maelstrom of conspiracy pitting good against evil.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Spirit Realm Walker

schedule.description:
Under the grand strategy of interstellar travel, humanity has entered the space age, but simultaneously faces the threat of UMA, a high-dimensional extraterrestrial life form from Ganymede, a being capable of devouring human consciousness and evolving itself. Xu Xinghe, a bright student who should be pursuing higher education, witnesses his brother being devoured by the alien creature, awakens special abilities, and embarks on a journey to find his brother's consciousness and fight against UMA. Along the way, he partners with the mysterious girl Jiang Yao, and the fate of humanity and UMA is about to reach a major turning point.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Xing Lu

schedule.description:
It tells the story of the heroine Tao Mengyan who returned to the mysterious village of Zangling in her dream to find the truth in order to resolve her nightmare. The village still retains the strange custom of worshiping "paper brides". Tao Mengyan, who was chosen as the "paper bride", experienced a life-and-death experience in Zangling Village, and finally solved the mystery of her past life and learned the thousand-year-old historical truth of the "Zangzun" belief in Zangling Village.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Zhi Jia Yi

schedule.description:
After a three-year, six-thousand-mile odyssey, Xu Fengnian, the world's most dissolute playboy, returns to Beiliang. Facing his father, Xu Xiao, he realizes that the Northern Liang sword will ultimately be his own. This time, his servant, Old Huang, offers his life as a token of his loyalty, respectfully inviting the prince into the martial arts world. Xu Fengnian no longer hides his true potential, brazenly unleashing his blade, brazenly facing the dual threat of the imperial court and the martial arts world, realizing his master plan and gradually uncovering the truth behind his mother, Wu Su's, death.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Fierce Sabre in the Snow

schedule.description:
Bounty hunter Marco Polo wanders the Kingdom of Kings and happens to take in Luban No. 7, a mechanical manipulator separated from Master Luban. To retrieve the "Tuling Treasure Box" tucked away in Luban No. 7, Marco accompanies Luban No. 7 on a quest to find Master Luban's family. However, they fall prey to an enemy conspiracy. From the Cloud Desert to the underground city of Chang'an, the two, having forged a deep friendship, face even more formidable challenges together.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Wangzhe Rongyao: Rongyao Zhi Zhang - Baozang Pian

schedule.description:
The work is a fusion of folklore, strange stories, cultivation system and suspenseful plots, creating a world of ghosts and gods that is intertwined with ancient meaning and strangeness.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)
schedule.title: Da Dao Zhi Shang

schedule.description:
After being confined to Qingshan Mental Hospital, the gifted young man Chen Ji kills the enemy who killed his parents. He then accidentally travels back in time to the ancient world and becomes an apprentice at the Ning Dynasty Medical Clinic. Involved in a case involving the Secret Service, he becomes a non-staff member of the agency, only to discover he's also a spy for the enemy nation. The story revolves around this dual identity. Trapped in the maelstrom of power, Chen Ji secretly fights for survival, using modern knowledge to deconstruct spiritual cultivation systems and maneuvering to overturn the chessboard. Ultimately, he transforms from pawn to master, wielding the Qingshan Mountains as his blade, vowing to shatter the hypocrisy of heaven!

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: The Azure Mountain

schedule.description:
A perpetual night of catastrophe, terror descends, and strange phenomena abound! A young man, Wang Ye, is inexplicably chosen by the "Mysterious Post Office" to serve as a "ghost messenger," awakening his special powers and repeatedly embroiling himself in dangerous and paranormal phenomena. Witness how Wang Ye pushes the envelope, dispelling the mysteries and igniting the flames of humanity's survival amidst the terrifying darkness.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Call Me Lord Eerie Bailiff

schedule.description:
"My name is Yang Jian, and by the time you read this, I'll be dead." Ordinary student Yang Jian is caught up in a bizarre invasion, acquiring parchment from the future and a mysterious eye, becoming a ghost wielder. Yang Jian and his classmates escape the campus, but the crisis is just beginning. In this sinister world, the human world is a prison. The price of peering into darkness is eternal loss amidst endless wonder.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Shenmi Fusu

schedule.description:
It offers a forward-thinking reflection on the technological explosion through a shifting world, integrating intellectual competition into urban legends and opening up a new realm of "intellectual combat literature."

(Source: Tencent, translated)
schedule.title: Genius Club

schedule.description: Min Jung Woo has a special ability, one that lets him see whenever a path leads to an unfortunate future. Min Jung Woo uses his eyes of "Misfortune" to spot unfortunate events and tries to stop them, leading him to become a terrorist feared by the people.
schedule.title: Terror Man

schedule.description: Third season of Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo.
schedule.title: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You Season 3

schedule.description:
In a world where songs have been banned, instead of humans playing instruments and creating music, a music app titled "MiucS" is in charge of these things. High school student Seria Aiba goes out with her friends one day, but she happens to hear someone singing, which is supposed to be prohibited. What she finds is a lone ghost, a "Great Ghost" who has appeared from outside this world.

(Source: ANN, edited)
schedule.title: Ghost Concert: Missing Songs

schedule.description:
In an alternate version of the early 20th-century, where steam power developed rapidly and progress has now stagnated—Kyoto is shrouded in soot, smoke, and steam.

Kihachi Sakamoto, a skeptical boy, is haunted by the loss of his brother with whom he once dreamed of an "Age of Electricity." Inako Momokawa, a deeply spiritual girl, feels forced to hide both her dreams and her regrets for her late mother. When Inako crosses paths with Kihachi, their encounter creates a spark that propels them to challenge a new era, with the 20th Century Electric Catalogue as their guide: a mysterious and visionary record full of secrets that could reshape the world.

To move beyond who they are now and reclaim the dreams they once held—this is a story of renewal.

(Source: MAL News)
schedule.title: Sparks of Tomorrow

items.title: Мои тёплые и нежны пожелания  для  ВАС

descriptions.big:
Дорогие и любимые мои, вот и подходит к концу этот год.
Уверен— в нём была грусть, cожаления, страхи.
Однако! В нём и были радости, смех, тепло и счастье.

Я счастлив, что за этот год я повстречал вас! Я счастлив что мой канал растёт.
Я безумно рад тому, что ваши сердца слышат и откликаются на мой свет.
Словами не описать моё счастье, мою любовь к вам.

Всем своим большим сердцем, я буду верить и посылать вам в Новом Году лучи тепла, заботы и поддержки. 
От боли и грусти мы никогда не сможем защититься. 
Однако мы сможем её научиться проживать. 
Так давайте, в Новом Году мы будем больше замечать в нашей жизни радость и счастье.
А боль и грусть, будем проходить быстрее и легче.

Я знаю, у нас всё получиться. Каждый из нас, получит то счастье к которому идёт.
Каждый из нас создаст мир— о котором мечтает.
Я знаю, ты умеешь создавать, всегда умел, просто возможно сейчас— позабыл об этом.


Спасибо за то—что вы есть
Спасибо за то— что ТЫ есть 

С улыбкой и радостными глазами, буду ждать тебя дорогой друг 
в Новом Году. 

Знай— ты не один, я рядом, ты всегда можешь мне написать 
https://t.me/SoulHikki




Хороший аниме сайт 
https://ru.yummyani.me/

items.title: Злость и Гнев—не делают тебя сильнее. Как АНИМЕ помогает нам принять свою тёмную сторону.

descriptions.big:
Гнев и злость часто кажутся силой.
В аниме они нередко выглядят как источник мощи, решимости и победы. Но в реальной жизни эта энергия почти всегда имеет цену.

В этом видео я размышляю о гневе ,о том, откуда он появляется.
Почему мы так часто боимся его признать и как он незаметно истощает нас и тех, кого мы любим.

Через примеры из аниме и личные размышления я хочу мягко поговорить о принятии своей тёмной стороны, и о том, почему она не тёмная.
О том, почему настоящая сила начинается не с ярости, а с понимания и заботы.

Если ты когда-нибудь чувствовал, что злость живёт внутри тебя слишком долго, возможно, это видео для тебя.

Напиши в комментариях,
как ты проживаешь гнев и что помогает тебе не разрушать себя.

collections.title: Сёнэн наше все
collections.description:
Данный сборник представляет собой список наиболее влиятельных произведений в сёнэн-направлении. 

Если ты хочешь по настоящему понять, что представляет из себя данный мета-жанра в классическом понимании — то ты набрел на верную коллекцию.

collections.title: Гарем — двигатель прогресса
collections.description:
Давайте будем честны: сколько из вас познакомились с аниме именно благодаря произведениям, где главный герой — aka «школьник обыкновенный» — в какой-то момент превращается в величайшего воина, спасителя мира или носителя древней силы, пробуждающейся в самый нужный момент? 

Предположу, что парочка таких точно найдётся.Несмотря на то что, вроде как, этот жанр понемногу начинает возвращаться, современные тайтлы уже обладают несколько иным шармом. 

Это, безусловно, не делает их ни хуже, ни лучше — просто другими.Цель данной коллекции — собрать и сгруппировать лучшие тайтлы в жанре этти/гарем, рассказывающие о молодых парнях, которым повезло немного больше, чем нам ;(
